description: I'm a versatile Full-Stack Developer skilled in both front-end and back-end development, creating seamless and scalable applications. With a strong foundation in AI, I integrate intelligent solutions into projects. Beyond software, my hands-on experience in electronics bridges the gap between hardware and software, enabling smart and IoT solutions. As a multilingual professional, I collaborate effectively across diverse teams. Let's connect and bring ideas to life with cutting-edge technology!
